channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Blocked drain., 15th April
item.description:
The drain outside the Methodist Church is blocked. It's been reported before and the Council took it off saying it will be cleared but still not done.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bishops Close, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped Mattress tied to substation, 15th April
item.description:
Someone has tied a mattress to the fence of a substation.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Wellesley Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish between 38 Marsh Gardens & Honeybourne Line, 15th April
item.description:
I reported this over a month ago. There is rubbish in the ‘nature reserve’. It attracts vermin and is horrible for the people who live close to it. It is hard to access but it Is CBC’s responsibility. Please can something be done this time!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 30, Marsh Gardens, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
